content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to delete the file "example.txt" but it had already been deleted. I used an AI command to read the file "productive_things_to_do.txt" and found a website with over 100 productive things to do when bored. It also includes an article on overcoming the planning fallacy and a personal account of following Benjamin Franklin's daily schedule, as well as promoting a free time tracking software called Clockify. I then used an AI command to append to the same file, adding the text "This is another productive thing to do: Learn a new language!" successfully.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt", "old_text": "new language", "new_text": "musical instrument", "occurrence_index": 1}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: Occurrence index 1 is out of range for new language in /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/productive_things_to_do.txt', type='action_result')]
"""
